recipe.title: The Maple-Ginger Hot Toddy
ingredients: 1 1/2 ounces maple-flavored bourbon (such as Knob Creek Smoked Maple)
1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice
instructions: Pour 3/4 cup boiling water over tea bags in a mug. Let steep 5 minutes, then remove tea bags. Stir in bourbon, lemon juice, and maple syrup. Garnish with lemon peel.
Do Ahead Tea can be steeped 5 days ahead. Cover and chill. Reheat before serving.
